## Toy data

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(plotly)
set.seed(12345)
group <- sample(c("blue", "red", "yellow"), size=100, replace = TRUE)
x <- rnorm(100, mean = 50, sd=10)
x[group=="blue"] <- x[group=="blue"] + runif(length(x[group=="blue"]), min=5, max=10)
x[group=="red"] <- x[group=="red"] - runif(length(x[group=="red"]), min=5, max=10)

y <- rnorm(100, mean = 10, sd=4) + x/2
y[group=="blue"] <- y[group=="blue"]*.7 + runif(length(x[group=="blue"]), min=1, max=14)
y[group=="red"] <- y[group=="red"]*1.3 - runif(length(x[group=="red"]), min=0, max=2)

z <- c()
z[group=="blue"] <- rnorm(length(x[group=="blue"]), mean = 8, sd=2)
z[group=="red"] <- rnorm(length(x[group=="red"]), mean = 6, sd=1)
z[group=="yellow"] <- rnorm(length(x[group=="yellow"]), mean = 10, sd=3)
```

```{r}
plot_ly(x = x, y = y, z = z, type = "scatter3d", mode = "markers", 
        color = group, colors=c("blue", "red", "yellow"))
```
